issue.title: Aggregate logs add diponibility time columns
issue.body:
**Original author :** Baud Rémy

We should add in the aggregate logs the following aggregate times:
-Unavailability
-Failure
-untested

..Like it is done for the raw logs. It would help for the health graph to make it more meaningfull.

comments.body:
**Original author :** Baud Rémy

should be done in this issue:

http://forge.easysdi.org/issues/show/274

**Original author :** Bergstedt Thomas

Are adding the 
-Unavailability
-Failure
-untested 
to the aggregate logs so the graph would show it.
in the ticket 274.

**Original author :** Magoni Bruno

Realized in #274 as mentionned by Thomas...
